explains: v. （用清水）冲洗；（用其他液体）洗；把（肥皂、污垢等）洗掉（rinse sth. off/out）；漱（口）；染发
n. 冲洗；头发定型剂，染发剂；（清洗用的）液体
wordGroup: rinse with 用…漂掉；用…冲洗掉

sentences.en: I gave the glass a rinse.
I wanted to rinse the taste out of my mouth.
sentences.cn: 我想漱漱口，去掉嘴里的味道。

sentences.en: Fabric conditioner is added during the final rinse.
sentences.cn: 在最后一遍漂洗时加入织物柔顺剂。
